attributes.title: Worst app experience ever!

attributes.title: In the hospital❤️
attributes.review: Horrible. Immediately after downloading and opening this app, a Honda Civic ran me over. I have over $20,000 in medical bills. Thanks for nothing, Donald.

attributes.title: horrendous
attributes.review: this app is the worst app ever created. never download it. as soon as i downloaded it everything went downhill in my life. this app needs to be taken off apple so no one else’s life will be ruined by it. not to mention the name of the app makes me gag that should’ve been my first clue to not download 🤢

attributes.title: The worst app I have ever got

attributes.title: AWFUL app
attributes.review: this app is clearly a front for spreading FAKE NEWS 🤬🤬🤬 it makes my phone go from 100% to 1% in TEN MINUTES, and all it does is LIES!!! please don't download this monstrosity!!
